data.title: New England Revolution
data.meta_description: All the latest New England Revolution news, videos, photos and tickets.
data.text:
Updated June 13, 2019

AT A GLANCE:

Has made 14 appearances with the Revolution since joining MLS in January 2018 following six professional seasons in Sweden.

Totaled 132 senior appearances in Sweden's top two divisions, registering six goals and 12 assists.

Made eight appearances in the 2017-18 UEFA Europa League Qualifiers and Group Stage for Ãstersunds FK.

Helped Ãstersunds FK claim the 2016-17 Svenska Cupen, Sweden's annual domestic cup.

Began professional career with Syrianska FC in 2012, spending first two seasons in top-division Allsvenskan.

Syrian international with two career senior caps, having debuted on March 20, 2019 vs. Iraq.

MLS CAREER: Left-footed defender with 14 appearances and 12 starts in two MLS seasons after joining the Revolution on Jan. 5, 2018 via a transfer from Swedish side Ãstersunds FKâ¦Owns 1,043 minutes played at left back and left wingbackâ¦Has totaled two assists.

2019: Has not appeared in a regular season game this seasonâ¦Played 60 minutes at left back in Final Whistle on Hate charity match vs. Chelsea FC on May 15â¦Missed some time while on international duty with Syria.

2018: (3/3) at PHI: Started and played 90 minutes at left back in MLS and Revolution debutâ¦(3/10) vs. COL: Started and played 17 minutes at left back before being subbed off due to a head injuryâ¦(3/24) vs. NYC: Saw 90 minutes of action in the 2-2 drawâ¦(3/31) at HOU: Recorded first career MLS assist with a long ball to Cristian Penilla in the second halfâ¦(4/6) vs. MTL: Notched an assist for a second straight game, delivering the cross in first-half stoppage time that led to Andrew Farrellâs goalâ¦Recorded a personal game-high two shots...(4/14) vs. DAL: Started and played 90 minutes at left back...Registered two shots for a second consecutive matchâ¦(4/28) vs. SKC: Started and played 90 minutes at left backâ¦Registered one shotâ¦(5/26) at VAN: Returned to the starting lineup at left back following two matches as an unused subâ¦Played 82 minutesâ¦(5/30) vs. ATL: Made first career substitute appearanceâ¦Played 46 minutesâ¦(6/13) at SJ: Returned to the starting lineup at left back and played 90 minutes.

CLUB CAREER OUTSIDE OF MLS: Played six professional seasons in Sweden before joining MLS in January 2018â¦Professional experience includes two seasons with Ãstersunds FK (2016-17) and Syrianska FC (2012-15)â¦Began professional career with Syrianska FC and played in Sweden's top-flight Allsvenskan from 2012-13â¦Made 18 appearances across all competitions in the 2012 seasonâ¦Made 11 combined appearances in 2013, and recorded his first career assistâ¦Played two seasons in Sweden's second-division Superettan from 2014-15â¦Made 29 appearances across all competitions and recorded first career goal, adding two assists, in 2014 seasonâ¦ Recorded 29 appearances and registered one goal and three assists in 2015 seasonâ¦Departed Syrianska FC for Swedish top-flight side Ãstersunds FK in January 2016â¦Made 18 combined appearances and registered two assists in 2016â¦Recorded 18 appearances across all competitions, posting a single-season career-high three goals and matching a previous single-season best of three assists in 2017â¦Helped Ãstersunds FK claim the 2016-17 Svenska Cupen, Sweden's annual domestic cup, placing the team in the second qualifying round of the 2017-18 UEFA Europa Leagueâ¦Made eight appearances in UEFA Europa League Qualifiers and Group Stage matches.

NATIONAL TEAM (SYRIA): Represents Syria on international stage and has been capped twiceâ¦Received first call-up prior to pair of World Cup Qualifiers on Oct. 5 and Oct. 10, 2017â¦Was on the bench for both matches, but did not playâ¦Joined the Syria National Team in Basra, Iraq on March 14, 2019 to participate in the 2019 International Friendship Championship between Syria, Iraq, and Jordanâ¦Made Syria debut in 1-0 loss to Syria on March 20, 2019, playing 30 minutesâ¦Made first international start and played 48 minutes in 1-0 win over Jordan on March 23, 2019.
